title: 2 best friends at 2 World Cups, 32 years apart. 2 different countries, same love.

author: Ivan_Botsky_Trollov
text: would be nice if that last pic was at a serbia-Germany game, like in the 1st pic it looks like Germany vs Yugoslavia

author: Chittopher
text: Wow, time flies. It was still Yugoslavia then. And West Germany.

author: barbol02
text: Maybe Croatia-Germany because Croatia could actually be playing against Germany, unlike Serbia.
